@@ -356,0 +356,14 @@ + /** + * A convenience factory method for creating a background with a single {@code Paint}. The background will use the + * default {@code CornerRadii} and the default {@code Insets} of {@link BackgroundFill}. + * + * @implNote this call is equivalent to + *

+ * {@code new Background(new BackgroundFill(fill, null, null));} + * @param fill the fill of the background + * @return a new background of the given fill + */ + public static Background fill(Paint fill) { + return new Background(new BackgroundFill(fill, null, null)); + } +

@@ -392,0 +392,14 @@ + /** + * A convenience factory method for creating a solid border with a single {@code Paint}. The border will use the + * default {@code CornerRadii} and the default {@code BorderWidths} of {@link BorderStroke}. + * + * @implNote this call is equivalent to + *

+ * {@code new Border(new BorderStroke(stroke, BorderStrokeStyle.SOLID, null, null));} + * @param stroke the stroke of the border + * @return a new border of the given stroke + */ + public static Border stroke(Paint stroke) { + return new Border(new BorderStroke(stroke, BorderStrokeStyle.SOLID, null, null)); + } +
